image-alt: student pulling book off of high shelf
title: Research Help Desk
paragraph: The Reference and Information Desk has moved to the 2nd floor! Head upstairs to chat with a librarian or visit our online help services.

title: Geospatial and Data Sciences Support
paragraph: The Data Hub provides support in the areas of GIS, data analysis, visualization, and research data management.

image-alt: two people with microphones with a neon sign saying The Studio
title: The Studio
paragraph: The Studio offers dedicated space to students, staff, faculty, and the community to record, edit, and digitize audiovisual content.

image-alt: Photograph of the MILL space showing 3d printers and computers
title: Visit The MILL
paragraph: Join us for workshops every week at the library's Making, Innovating, and Learning Laboratory (MILL)

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

image-alt: group portrait of 11 employees of Twin Falls station is pasted on a page containing handwritten notes
title: Stories from Spec
paragraph: Check out Special Collections and Archives' Harvester blog featuring the unique materials stewarded by the library.
